name: part_000
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】AZKi 7th Birthday Live ＂Sweet Pop Story＂ 新衣装お披露目＆重大発表【#AZKi生誕ライブ2025】 [gdQ4eN9wzZg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Title card for AZKi 7th Birthday Live 'Sweet Pop Story' with background music.
AZKi walks through a park and meets the viewer, asking to hold hands and talking about her upcoming live performance.
AZKi and the viewer sit on a park bench together and continue their conversation.

subtitles.original:
AZKi 7th Birthday Live
Sweet Pop Story
新衣装お披露目＆重大発表あり
subtitles.english:
AZKi 7th Birthday Live
Sweet Pop Story
New Outfit Reveal & Major Announcement

subtitles.original: 私は今来たところ。全然待ってないよ。
subtitles.english: I just got here. I haven't been waiting at all.

subtitles.original: むしろ今日は来てくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: Actually, thank you for coming today!
It's a nice day, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 私さ、ずっと君とこうやって公園とか散歩したいと思ってたんだ。
subtitles.english: You know, I've always wanted to take a walk in the park like this with you.

subtitles.original: あのさ、手、繋いでもいいかな？
subtitles.english: Um, is it okay if we hold hands?

subtitles.original: やったー！繋いじゃおう！
手を繋いでるとなんかドキドキするね。
subtitles.english: Holding hands makes my heart race a bit.

subtitles.original: いよいよこれから生誕ライブか。緊張するな。
subtitles.english: My birthday live is finally coming up soon. I'm so nervous.

subtitles.original: 君ももちろん来てくれるよね？
